correctness.rationale: The extraction is largely incorrect or ungrounded for many fields and contains numerous placeholder/zero values that do not match the article. Key issues: (1) Thickness control—GPC values use wrong units/magnitudes: article reports 0.08, 0.12, 0.22 nm/cycle for InOx, GaOx, ZnO; the schema requires Å, so they should be 0.8, 1.2, 2.2 Å, not 0.08, 0.12, 0.22 Å. (2) Many parameters are set to 0 or 'Not Found' despite being either reported or not reported in the paper: plasmaPower=0 W (not provided; zero is invalid), pressure=0 mTorr (not provided; zero invalid), dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates/nucleationPeriod set to 0 (not reported; zero unrealistic); numberofCycles=0 (missing). (3) Supercycle design—InOx subcycles fixed at 4; the paper varies n from 4 to 20. If a specific sample is represented, e.g., IGZO1.8nm, InOx count should be 20; otherwise, specify all or clearly state which sample. (4) Material properties—band gap set to 0 eV (article gives ~2.98→2.67 eV via UV–Vis), refractive index was discussed but not zero; electrical properties (carrier density, mobility) set to 0 (article provides Hall data; e.g., IGZO1.8nm: n≈7.1×10^17 cm^-3 and μ≈10.9 cm^2/V·s); roughness set to 0 (Table 2 shows ~0.5 nm RMS); film density set to 0 (Table 2 shows 6.49–6.76 g/cm^3). Film composition missing: article provides In/Zn/Ga ratios, e.g., IGZO1.8nm ≈ 2.8:1.7:1, and O% values. (5) Device properties—set to zero though Table 3 reports values for IGZO1.8nm (μ_sat≈74.3 cm^2/V·s; μ_eff≈65.5 cm^2/V·s; V_th≈−1.3 V; SS≈0.26 V/dec → 260 mV/dec; I_ON/I_OFF≈8.9×10^8). (6) Carrier/purging gas: Ar purging is stated, but carrier gas isn’t explicitly specified; setting carrierGas='Ar' is not traceable. (7) Schema/unit issues: carrier density should use PER-M3 and convert from cm^-3; SS must be in mV per schema; growth-per-cycle units must be Å with correct magnitudes. Properties requiring correction/review include: growthPerCycle values/units; plasmaPower; pressure; dosing/purge/flow rates and nucleationPeriod (or omit if schema allows); numberofCycles; bandGap; electrical properties (carrierDensity, mobility); roughness; filmDensity; filmComposition (elemental concentrations and atomic ratios); device metrics (μ, V_th, SS in mV, I_ON/I_OFF); supercycle InOx count to match selected sample; and ensure all filled values are traceable to the article.

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incomplete and contains multiple incorrect or placeholder values, with poor traceability to the article. Key issues: (1) Multiple processes not captured: the article reports a supercycle series with n = 4, 8, 12, 16, 20 (IGZO0.3nm–IGZO1.8nm) and also a flexible-substrate case; only one process is provided, so composition/stack variations per supercycle are missing. (2) Growth-per-cycle unit mismatch: article gives GPC in nm/cycle (InOx 0.08 nm, GaOx 0.12 nm, ZnO 0.22 nm) but extraction reports these as the same numeric values in Å, off by 10×. (3) Supercycle design incomplete: only n=4 shown; counts for other n values are omitted; total number of cycles is set to 0. (4) Many required process parameters are set to 0 or “Not Found” despite being available or should be omitted when unknown: plasmaPower=0 W, pressure=0 mmHg, dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates=0; these are not reported in the paper and zero is incorrect. (5) Material properties missing/inaccurate: roughness set to 0 (article: RMS ~0.48–0.52 nm); film density 0 (article: 6.49–6.76 g/cm3 via XRR); optical band gap 0 (article: 2.98→2.67 eV; transmittance >87%); crystallinity method is “Not Found” though XRD/TEM are given; composition ratios missing (article Table 1 lists In/Zn/Ga ratios). (6) Film electrical properties absent: Hall carrier density and mobility (Table S1) not included. (7) Device properties absent: μ_eff/μ_sat, V_th, SS, and I_ON/I_OFF from Table 3 are all 0 despite explicit values. (8) Uniformity/conformality set to 0%/0 aspect ratio without support. To be complete, add separate process instances for each n (and note substrate variants), correct GPC units, populate film/device property values with correct numbers and QUDT-compliant units, include film composition ratios and roughness/density, and remove zero placeholders for unreported parameters.
